TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. In fact, this genie is feeling generous so you get TWO bunnies! Whoops, now there's ten. A hundred! Ten hundred! Uh oh...

I wish for a remote-control lawnmower.

Granted! However, you don't have a remote.

I wish for my Drumsticks to not have been left in the fridge, so I can eat them normally instead of having to slurp up melted ice cream.

Granted. It's rabid.

 

I wish 4 u 2 get rekt.

Granted, but you get wrecked aswell.

 

I wish for world peace.
Granted, but aliens invade the next day and take over humanity.

Granted - there is nothing to grant. But you break the universe.

I wish I had an ice cream and no lactose intolerance.

Granted - there is nothing to grant. But you break the universe.

I wish I had an ice cream and no lactose intolerance.

Granted, but it's only for 0.00000000000001 seconds, then you have to double post everything. For the records, @qzgy double posted the above post, even if he/she edits it.

 

I wish that I could alter reality in my favor.

Granted, but it's party favors. Nothing but paper hats and confetti for you!

 

I wish to leave work early today.

Granted. You leave -7 hours earlier.

 

I wish that TV wouldn't make me feels.

Granted. TV feels YOU now!

 

I wish for random numbers, all integer.

Granted (0.83737186), but they are a decimal.

I wish for the universe to end.
Gr-

Granted? You lose it.

I wish not to double post.

Granted, you triple post.

I wish for my rockets to explode.

Edited August 5, 2016 by rlin

Granted, but your planes don't

I wish for a world with dinosaurs that dont eat us.

Sorry, double post....

Edited August 5, 2016 by qzgy
Granted. Pterosaurs eat us.
I wish that people would follow the game rules and post a wish as well, not just a corruption.

Granted, but everybody doubleposts

Granted, but everybody doubleposts

I wish I could live in an air fortress that cannot crash.

Granted, It burns up on re-entry.

I wish to catch a fish. Tommorow.

Granted, but it's a new species of air breathing piranha.

I wish my crappy computer could run my 48,000 ton Leviathan at more than 2 seconds per frame.

Yours could, but it will explode 2 seconds after.

i wish a good mommy!

Granted, but she is super bossy!

I wish Jeb kerman would vanish forever!

He does, but a clone comes shortly after.

I wish to have more cereal because I just finished the box.

Granted. But you know, eating the box was a bad idea, you'll be spending the night over the toilet.

I wish the SNES was still the best console around.
